title: How I Spent My Summer Vacation...
author: oldnick

comments.content:
Nick, they also have a collection left by Warren Chappell. Once VCU "got lost in the dark" I decided to leave my collection to UVA also.

Good for you.
That is so cool Nick - good placement of your "stuff" - well done!

Yay Nick—keep on keepin' on!

The Type Heritage Project hopes to hear from you soon...

Hang in there, Anna  
 [http://forums.typeheritage.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041910/http:/forums.typeheritage.com/ "http://forums.typeheritage.com/")
Very cool. Thanks for ensuring that these materials are preserved for posterity.
I always beasy with work when holiday come spend my all time with my family and just visited near park or going for shopping.
